name: Kendriya Vihar Kharghar
description:
This is a game made on the Map of a township called Kendriya Vihar located in a town called  Kharghar from the city of  Navi Mumbai in Maharashtra, India. This township has over one thousand two hundred flats and is a beautiful planned housing complex . I have tried to cover over 19 acres of land  in a few small game levels.

This game revolves around a boy who has forgotten to take his Face Mask and is walking in the township avoiding dangerous Viruses, Bacteria's  , Monsters and more 

The game is built to spread awareness about Covid-19 Protocols 

This is my first game but it can be played on any smart phone (Android or IOS) , (The display size may differ from one device to another ... sorry about that)

Please share this game if you like it . 

Thanks
